fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check if a player owns the hit 2015 Toby Fox game 'Undertale'

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When checking, the player must provide their steam library. If they have none, they will be attacked. They will also be attacked if the steam library doesn't include the hit 2015 Toby Foz game 'Undertale'.
- If they can prove they own the Toby Fox game 'Deltarune', this will be downgraded to a basic attack.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill literally everyone who doesn't own the hit 2015 Toby Fox game 'Undertale'
